column1: Little Goat Diner////My husband and I went to Little Goat
column2: it was my first time and my husband was willing to 'give it a second chance.'  What we had was the patty melt
column3: fat club sandwich and chocolate malt shakes.  The shakes were the winner here the other items were fine but typical
column4: which is not what I expected from Little Goat. On the first try my husband had the fried pickles and onions and chicken cordon bleu again uninspired meh diner food.
